frontmatter.title: Pangeo stack on EarthCODE
frontmatter.description: This training introduces participants to the EDC Pangeo Cloud Platform and scalable geospatial analysis using Python tools. Participants will learn how to access data programmatically from the EarthCODE Open Science Catalog via the STAC API, explore Zarr-formatted datasets, and use Xarray with Dask for efficient data processing. The session includes a hands-on example and guidance on saving and publishing results back to the EarthCODE Catalog.
frontmatter.subtitle: Pangeo meets EarthCODE
frontmatter.subject: EarthCODE Tutorials

children.value: Welcome to the ESA EarthCODE 101 Workshop!

children.label: Welcome to the ESA EarthCODE 101 Workshop!

children.value: Doing Open Science shouldnâ€™t be hard, and EarthCODE makes it easy!

This tutorial introduces participants to the EDC Pangeo Cloud Platform and scalable geospatial analysis using Python tools. Participants will learn how to access data programmatically from the EarthCODE Open Science Catalog via the STAC API, explore Zarr-formatted datasets, and use Xarray with Dask for efficient data processing. The session includes a hands-on example and guidance on saving and publishing results back to the EarthCODE Catalog.

prev.title: Reproducing an openEO Experiment published to the EarthCODE Open Science Catalogue
